thread.title: 2 Chainz Teases New Music Collaboration With Justin Bieber
thread.title_full: 2 Chainz Teases New Music Collaboration With Justin Bieber

author: Daniel Pearson
title: 2 Chainz Teases New Music Collaboration With Justin Bieber
text:
Justin Bieber spread his wings in 2016 to release music with the likes of Major Lazer , DJ Snake and Post Malone , and now it appears he’s keeping the collab vibes rolling into the new year with a partnership with 2 Chainz.
The Atlanta rapper took to Instagram on Monday morning to post a picture of himself with the Canadian megastar, along with the cryptic message: “New music on the way ??? Take JB to the trap ???”
New music on the way ??? Take JB to the trap ??? 
A photo posted by 2 Chainz Aka Tity Boi (@hairweavekiller) on Jan 2, 2017 at 9:19am PST 

Neither Biebz nor 2 Chainz have revealed any specifics, but that hasn’t stopped the post racking up over 45,000 likes and 1,500 comments. Who knows what the pair have up their sleeves. Stay tuned for more information.
In the meantime, here’s 2 Chainz drinking $600 coffee made from cat poop.

After you’ve finished, here are 10 music trends that will be huge in 2017 .
